forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 51F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low near 0C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 34F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 37F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 37F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low near 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 34F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers will become more widely scattered in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. High 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy later with any flurries or snow showers ending by midnight. Low -7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy later with any flurries or snow showers ending by midnight. Low 22F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low -13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 11F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 3C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low -11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 14F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 19F. Winds light and variable.
